text: Benin has been in every Summer Olympic Games held since 1980. Benin has never won an Olympic medal. No athletes from Benin have been in any Winter Olympic Games. The International Olympic Committee's official abbreviation for Benin is BEN."Abbreviations, National Olympic Committees," 2009 Annual Report, p. 90 [PDF p. 91 of 94]; retrieved 2012-10-12. In 1964, it was DAY for Dahomey. "Official abbreviations" at The Games of the XVIII Olympiad, Tokyo, 1964, [p. 9 of 409 PDF]; retrieved 2012-10-12. ==Related pages== * List of IOC country codes ==References== == Other websites == * Benin profile at London2012.com *Benin at SportsReference.com Olympics Category:Nations at the Olympics
title: Benin at the Olympics
